note:
Irish. Canadian. GenXer. Settler. She/her. Grandma. Gardener. Hoomom to beagles.
 Interested in restorative approaches/just relations, human-centred services, how might people and communities interact progressively wrt climate change.

Sourdough bread, coffee, red wine, great telly, music, podcasts, poetry, indoor plants, enneagram 8.

Located by the Atlantic in Mi’kma’ki/ Nova Scotia
